title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
OB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to the user. However, in the current state, no error message is being shown.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Preview page.
2. Make sure there is no data available for any series.
3. Check if a friendly error message is displayed.
